name: api_physics2d_PolygonCollider2D
description: Collider for 2D physics representing an arbitrary polygon defined by its vertices.

properties.name: autoTiling
properties.description: Determines whether the PolygonCollider2D's shape is automatically updated based on a SpriteRenderer'

properties.name: pathCount
properties.description: The number of paths in the polygon.

properties.name: points
properties.description: Corner points that define the collider's shape in local space.

properties.name: useDelaunayMesh
properties.description: When the value is true, the Collider uses an additional Delaunay triangulation step to produce the C

properties.name: CreateFromSprite
properties.description: Create polygon shapes using the selected sprite.

properties.name: CreatePrimitive
properties.description: Creates as regular primitive polygon with the specified number of sides.

properties.name: GetPath
properties.description: Gets a path from the Collider by its index.

properties.name: GetTotalPointCount
properties.description: Return the total number of points in the polygon in all paths.

properties.name: SetPath
properties.description: Define a path by its constituent points.

properties.name: Destroy
properties.description: Removes a GameObject, component, or asset.

properties.name: DestroyImmediate
properties.description: Destroys the specified object immediately. Use with caution and in Edit mode only.

properties.name: DontDestroyOnLoad
properties.description: Do not destroy the target Object when loading a new Scene.

properties.name: FindAnyObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves any active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindFirstObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves the first active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindObjectsByType
properties.description: Retrieves a list of all loaded objects of Type type.

properties.name: Instantiate
properties.description: Clones the object original and returns the clone.
